Q_DESC:
Write a program to takes input date as [dd/mm/yyyy] format and find out the day of entered date.
If the day falls on Sunday then output is 1, similarly if the day falls on Monday then the output is 2 and so on....
Output = [Sunday=1...........Saturday=7]
Sample Input 1:
30
5
2017
Sample output 1:
3
Reason (Tuesday=3)
